# scaffold

> Scaffold new Python projects with opinionated defaults

## Documentation

- [Installation](docs/index.md#installation): Install scaffold using pip or uv
- [Usage](docs/index.md#usage): Learn how to use scaffold as a library or CLI tool
- [Development](docs/index.md#development): Set up a development environment and run tests

## Project Information

- **Source Code**: https://github.com/Ben O'Mahony/scaffold
- **PyPI Package**: https://pypi.org/project/scaffold
- **Documentation**: https://Ben O'Mahony.github.io/scaffold

## AI Integration

- **MCP Server**: Model Context Protocol server available at `src/scaffold/mcp_server.py` for AI-powered documentation access
- **Agent Skill**: Claude Code skill available in `.skills/scaffold/SKILL.md` for enhanced project interaction
